page.title: 07My Day By Helen Buttle cont.
page.content: When I had done all my dictionary Mrs Symonds said " I want you to write about your day" which I'm doing now.At play time I played Fox'n gloves with some of my friends.After play I did some more work about my day.We packed up 11.30 and did some music in the hall for harvest.Then we got our lunch boxes.I had ham sandwiches a drink of ribena and a bar of chocolate.After lunch it was play time.I played dog's I was a puppy.After play we did games.We did catching and batting.Then Mrs Symonds read us a bit about Stig in the Dump.Then it was home time.In the bus I sat next to Joanna.At home I changed and did some gardening with Paul.After gardening it was dinner time. I had sausages and peas.After tea I had a bath.At bedtime I wore a night dress and I went to bed at 19.00.
